action.title: Heavy Crossbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

action.title: Constrict
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and a Large or smaller target is grappled (escape DC 12) . Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the blight can't constrict another target.

action.title: Entangling Plants (Recharge 5-6)
value: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or become restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check, freeing it self or another entangled creature within reach on a success.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

action.title: Rotting Touch
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

vladimir_horngaard.name: Vladimir Horngaard
vladimir_horngaard.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned

trait.title: Regeneration
value: Vladimir regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Vladimir's body is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.title: Rejuvenation
value: When Vladimir's body is destroyed, his soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.title: Turn Immunity
value: Vladimir is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.title: Vengeful Tracker
value: Vladimir knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and Vladimir are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by Vladimir dies, Vladimir knows.

action.title: Multiattack
value: Vladimir makes two fist attacks or two attacks with his +2 Greatsword.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature against which Vladimir has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Vladimir can grapple the target (escape DC 14) provided the target is Large or smaller.

action.title: Greatsword +2
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6+4) slashing damage. Against Strahd, Vladimir deals an extra 14 (4d6) slashing damage with this weapon.

action.title: Vengeful Glare
value: Vladimir targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him and against which he has sworn vengeance. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is paralyzed until Vladimir deals damage to it, or until the end of Vladimir's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is frightened of Vladimir for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see Vladimir, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

vrock.name: Vrock
vrock.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Talons
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Spores (Recharge 6)
value: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 5 (1d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

action.title: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
value: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the vrock's next turn .

action.title: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
value: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A vrock has a 30 percent chance of summoning 2d4 dretches or one vrock.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.title: Keen Sight and Smell
value: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

war_priest.name: War Priest

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The priest is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon
3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader’s mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water wall
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin
5th level (1 slot): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

action.title: Multiattack
value: The priest makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Maul
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 +3) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.title: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: The priest grants a +10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The priest can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

war_priest.spells: light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith, lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon, beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water wall, banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin , flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

trait.title: Trampling Charge
value: If the horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

warlock_of_the_archfey.name: Warlock of the Archfey

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: disguise self, mage armor (self only), silent image, speak with animals
1/day: conjure fey

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The warlock is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, eldritch blast, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
1st-5th level (3 5th-level slots): blink, charm person, dimension door, dominate beast, faerie fire, fear, hold monster, misty step, phantasmal force, seeming, sleep

action.title: Dagger
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

reaction.title: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: In response to taking damage, the warlock turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

warlock_of_the_archfey.spells: disguise self, mage armor, silent image, speak with animals, conjure fey, dancing lights, eldritch blast, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery, blink, charm person, dimension door, dominate beast, faerie fire, fear, hold monster, misty step, phantasmal force, seeming, sleep

warlock_of_the_fiend.name: Warlock of the Fiend
warlock_of_the_fiend.resist: slashing damage from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
warlock_of_the_fiend.languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image
1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The warlock is a l7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
1st-5th level (4 5th-level slots): banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

trait.title: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll’s effects occur.

action.title: Mace
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

warlock_of_the_fiend.spells: alter self, false life, levitate, mage armor, silent image, feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift, eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

warlock_of_the_great_old_one.name: Warlock of the Great Old One

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, jump, levitate, mage armor (self only), speak with dead
1/day each: arcane gate, true seeing

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The warlock is a 14th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, guidance, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

1st-5th level (3 5th-level slots): armor of Agathys, arms of Hadar, crown of madness, clairvoyance, contact other plane, detect thoughts, dimension door, dissonant whispers, dominate beast, telekinesis, vampiric touch

trait.title: Whispering Aura
value: At the start of each of the warlock’s turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn’t incapacitated.

action.title: Dagger
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

warlock_of_the_great_old_one.spells: detect magic, jump, levitate, mage armor, speak with dead, arcane gate, true seeing, chill touch, eldritch blast, guidance, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, armor of Agathys, arms of Hadar, crown of madness, clairvoyance, contact other plane, detect thoughts, dimension door, dissonant whispers, dominate beast, telekinesis, vampiric touch

trait.title: Indomitable (3/Day)
value: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

trait.title: Survivor
value: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

action.title: Shortbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 it, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

legendary.title: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
value: The warlord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.title: Weapon Attack
value: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary.title: Command Ally
value: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.title: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord’s next turn.

water_elemental.name: Water Elemental
water_elemental.resist: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
water_elemental.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.title: Water Form
value: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.title: Freeze
value: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 ft. until the end of its next turn.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
value: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.

water_elemental_myrmidon.name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
water_elemental_myrmidon.resist: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
water_elemental_myrmidon.languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

action.title: Trident
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
value: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

water_weird.name: Water Weird
water_weird.resist: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
water_weird.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious

trait.title: Invisible in Water
value: The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

trait.title: Water Bound
value: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

action.title: Constrict
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 ft. toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

werebear.name: Werebear
werebear.ac: 10 (in humanoid form, 11 in bear and hybrid forms )
werebear.speed: 30 ft. (40 ft., climb 30 ft. in bear or hybrid form)
werebear.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it. is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The werebear has advantage on WisGlom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.title: Multiattack
value: In bear form, the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form, it makes two greataxe attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a bear or a humanoid.

action.title: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with were bear lycanthropy.

action.title: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

wereboar.name: Wereboar
wereboar.ac: 10 (in humanoid form, 11 in boar and hybrid forms )
wereboar.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
value: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.title: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: The wereboar makes two attacks, only one of which can be with its tusks.

action.title: Maul (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.

wererat.name: Wererat
wererat.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.title: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

action.title: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only).
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

action.title: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

wereraven.name: Wereraven
wereraven.speed: 30 ft., fly 50 ft. in raven and hybrid forms
wereraven.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

trait.title: Mimicry
value: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.title: Multiattack (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
value: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

action.title: Beak (Raven or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

action.title: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.title: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

weretiger.name: Weretiger
weretiger.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The weretiger can use its action to polymorph into a tiger-humanoid hybrid or into a tiger, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The weretiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.title: Pounce (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
value: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the weretiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.title: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: In humanoid form, the weretiger makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a humanoid or make two claw attacks.

action.title: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.

action.title: Claw (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.ac: 11 (in humanoid form, 12 in wolf or hybrid form)
werewolf.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.title: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

action.title: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.title: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

action.title: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

white_dragon_wyrmling.name: White Dragon Wyrmling
white_dragon_wyrmling.speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

action.title: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
value: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

white_guard_drake.name: White Guard Drake
white_guard_drake.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.title: Source
value: Volo's Guide to Monsters, p. 158

action.title: Multiattack
value: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

wiggan_nettlebee.name: Wiggan Nettlebee

trait.title: Brave Devotion
value: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Wiggan is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, shillelagh, thaumaturgy
• 1st Level (4 slots): animal friendship, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, speak with animals
• 2nd Level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth, spiritual weapon

action.title: Multiattack
value: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.

action.title: Wooden Cane
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

wiggan_nettlebee.spells: guidance, light, mending, shillelagh, thaumaturgy, animal friendship, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, speak with animals, barkskin, spike growth, spiritual weapon

wight.name: Wight
wight.immune: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
wight.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.title: Life Drain
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.title: Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.title: Longbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

will-o'-wisp.name: Will-o'-Wisp
will-o'-wisp.resist: acid, cold, fire, necrotic, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
will-o'-wisp.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
will-o'-wisp.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.title: Consume Life
value: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 ft. of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

trait.title: Ephemeral
value: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

trait.title: Incorporeal Movement
value: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.title: Variable Illumination
value: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.title: Shock
value: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

action.title: Invisibility
value: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

windharrow.name: Windharrow

trait.title: Fey Ancestry
value: Windharrow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Windharrow is an 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Windharrow knows the following bard spells:
• Cantrips (at will): friends, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
• 1st level (4 slots): disguise self, dissonant whispers, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, shatter, silence
• 3rd level (3 slots): nondetection, sending, tongues
• 4th level (2 slots): confusion, dimension door

action.title: Multiattack
value: Windharrow makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Rapier
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

windharrow.spells: friends, prestidigitation, vicious mockery, disguise self, dissonant whispers, thunderwave, invisibility, shatter, silence, nondetection, sending, tongues, confusion, dimension door

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Dagger
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Dropped Rock
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, one target directly below the kobold. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.title: Snow Camouflage
value: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.title: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
value: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Magic Club
value: In the wood woad’s hand, its club is magical and deals 7 (3d4) extra damage (included in its attacks).

trait.title: Plant Camouflage
value: The wood woad has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The wood woad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the wood woad’s next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

trait.title: Tree Stride
value: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The wood woad makes two attacks with its club.

action.title: Club
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d4+4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The worg has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

wraith.resist: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Incorporeal Movement

The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

action.title: Multiattack

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

xorn.name: Xorn
xorn.resist: piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

trait.title: Earth Glide
value: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.title: Stone Camouflage
value: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.title: Treasure Sense
value: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.title: Low Cunning
value: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.title: Overbearing Pack
value: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart’s allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

trait.title: Raxivort's Tongue
value: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

action.title: Shortsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.title: Sling
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

xvart_speaker.languages: Abyssal plus one other language, usually Common or Goblin

xvart_warlock_of_raxivort.name: Xvart Warlock of Raxivort

value: The xvart's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, mage armor (self only)

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The xvart is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC ll, +3 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray, prestidigitation
1st-2nd level (2 2nd-level slots): burning hands, expeditious retreat, invisibility, scorching ray

value: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart’s allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

value: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

yakfolk_priest.name: Yakfolk Priest

trait.title: Possession (Recharges after a rest
value: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed a DC 12 Con saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything its carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and it unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and cannot be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lats until either the body drops to 0 hit points, the yakfolk ends the possession as an action, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body and is stunned until the end of its next turn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well and its body does not reappear.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The yakfolk is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, cure wounds, sanctuary
• 2nd level (3 slots): augury, hold person, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, protection from energy, sending
• 4th level (1 slots): banishment

action.title: Multiattack
value: The yakfolk makes two attacks, either with it's greatsword or its longbow

action.title: Quarterstaff
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage, or 12 (2d8+3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.title: Summon Earth Elemental (1/day)
value: The yakfolk summons an earth elemental. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner and acts as an ally of the summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

The yakfolk now controls the body and cannot be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lats until either the body drops to 0 hit points, the yakfolk ends the possession as an action, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as dispel evil and good spell. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well and its body does not reappear.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The yakfolk makes two attacks, either with it's greatsword or its longbow

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Longbow

yan-c-bin.name: Yan-C-Bin
yan-c-bin.resist: cold, fire;  bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
yan-c-bin.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.title: Air Form
value: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if air could pass through that space.

trait.title: Empowered Attacks
value: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Yan-C-Bin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
• At will: gust of wind, invisibility, lightning bolt
• 2/day each: chain lightning, cloudkill, haste

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Yan-C-Bin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Yan-C-Bin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.title: Multiattack
value: Yan-C-Bin makes two slam attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) force damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

action.title: Thundercrack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a terrible thundercrack in a 100-foot- radius sphere centered on himself. All other creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (9d6) thunder damage and be deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is deafened until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.

action.title: Change Shape
value: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.

action.title: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
value: Yan-C-Bin summons up to three air elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Yan-C-Bin, and disappear if Yan-C-Bin is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.title: Peal of Thunder
value: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a peal of thunder that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. Each creature within 30 feet of Yan-C-Bin takes 5 (1d10) thunder damage.

legendary.title: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Yan-C-Bin magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Yan-C-Bin is wearing or carrying is teleported with him.

legendary.title: Suffocate (Costs 3 Actions)
value: Yan-C-Bin steals the air of one breathing creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target drops to 0 hit points and is dying. On a successful save, the target can't breathe or speak until the start of its next turn.

yan-c-bin.spells: gust of wind, invisibility, lightning bolt, chain lightning, cloudkill, haste

yeenoghu.name: Yeenoghu
yeenoghu.immune: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Yeenoghu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, spiritual weapon (8th-level spell, 4d8 + 2 force damage on a hit, appears as a flail)
3/day each: dispel magic, fear, invisibility
1/day: teleport

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapon
value: Yeenoghu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Rampage
value: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

action.title: Multiattack
value: Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause it to create an additional effect of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multi attack):
1. The attack deals an extra 13 (2d12) bludgeoning damage.
2. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.
3. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the confusion spell until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.

action.title: Flail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (2d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) piercing damage.

Yeenoghu can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Yeenoghu regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.title: Charge
value: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.

legendary.title: Swat Away
value: Yeenoghu makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.

legendary.title: Savage (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Yeenoghu makes a bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

yeenoghu.spells: detect magic, spiritual weapon, dispel magic, fear, invisibility, teleport

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
value: If Yestabrod fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (3d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.

action.title: Caustic Spores (1/Day)
value: Yestabrod releases spores in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw ortake 1d6 acid damage at the start of each of Yestbrod's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Infestation Spores (1/Day)
value: Yestabrod releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table in appendix D) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfecte, and it must be repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

Yestabrod can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Yestabrod regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.title: Corpse Burst
value: Gore, offal, and acid erupt from a corpse within 20 feet of Yestabrod. Creatures within 10 feet of the corpse must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.

legendary.title: Foul Absorption
value: Yestabrod absorbs putrescence from a corpse within 5 feet of it, regaining 1d8 + 2 hit points

yeth_hound.name: Yeth Hound
yeth_hound.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
yeth_hound.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The yeth hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.title: Sunlight Banishment
value: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

trait.title: Telepathic Bond
value: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage if the target is frightened.

action.title: Baleful Baying
value: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the hound’s next turn or until the hound is incapacitated. A frightened target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

trait.title: Fear of Fire
value: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.title: Snow Camouflage
value: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

action.title: Chilling Gaze
value: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

yochlol.name: Yochlol
yochlol.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The yochlol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect thoughts, web
1/day: dominate person

trait.title: Web Walker
value: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 ft. in demon form), one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

action.title: Mist Form
value: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the yochlol is incapacitated and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is incapacitated.

action.title: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
value: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A yochlol has a 50 percent chance of summoning one yochlol.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

The shadow is under the dragon's control.

yuan-ti_anathema.name: Yuan-ti Anathema

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Anathema Form Only)
value: The anathema’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only)
3/day each: darkness, entangle, fear, haste, suggestion, polymorph
1/day: divine word

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Ophidiophobia Aura
value: Any creature of the anathema’s choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

trait.title: Six Heads
value: The anathema has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded. charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

trait.title: Variant: Acid Slime
value: As a bonus action, the yuan-ti can coat its body in a slimy acid that lasts for 1 minute. A creature that touches the yuan-ti, hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, or is hit by its constrict attack takes 5 (1d10) acid damage.

trait.title: Variant: Chameleon Skin
value: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
value: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

action.title: Multiattack (Anathema Form Only)
value: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

action.title: Claw (Anathema Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

action.title: Constrict
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can’t constrict another target.

action.title: Flurry of Bites
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (6d6+6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

value: The yuan-ti is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrip (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast (range 300 ft., +3 bonus to each damage roll), mage hand, message, poison spray, prestidigitation
1st-3rd level (2 3rd-level slots): arms of Hadar, darkness, fear, hex, hold person, hunger of Hadar, witch bolt

trait.title: Variant: Chameleon Skin
value: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
value: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

action.title: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
value: The yuan-ti makes one constrict attack and one scimitar attack.

action.title: Constrict
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the yuan-ti can’t constrict another target.

action.title: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

action.title: Invoke Nightmare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: The yuan-ti taps into the nightmares of a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates an illusory, immobile manifestation of the creature’s deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 11 (2d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the manifestation, believing it to be real. The yuan-ti must concentrate to maintain the illusion (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute and can’t be harmed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the illusion on a success, or taking 11 (2d10) psychic damage on a failure.

yuan-ti_nightmare_speaker.spells: animal friendship, suggestion, chill touch, eldritch blast, mage hand, message, poison spray, prestidigitation, arms of Hadar, darkness, fear, hex, hold person, hunger of Hadar, witch bolt

yuan-ti_pit_master.name: Yuan-ti Pit Master

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
value: The yuan-ti’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day: suggestion

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Poison’s Disciple (2/Day)
value: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage to the target.

trait.title: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Farm Only)
value: The yuan-ti is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast (range 300 ft., +3 bonus to each damage roll), friends, guidance, mage hand, message, poison spray
1st-3rd level (2 3rd-level slots): command, counterspell, hellish rebuke, invisibility, misty step, unseen servant, vampiric touch

trait.title: Variant: Chameleon Skin
value: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
value: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

action.title: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
value: The yuan-ti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.title: Merrshaulk's Slumber (1/Day)
value: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.

yuan-ti_pit_master.spells: animal friendship, suggestion, eldritch blast, friends, guidance, mage hand, message, poison spray, command, counterspell, hellish rebuke, invisibility, misty step, unseen servant, vampiric touch

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The yuan-ti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only)
3/day each: poison spray, suggestion

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Scimitar
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

action.title: Shortbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

trait.title: Unarmored Defense
value: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

trait.title: Roleplaying Information
value: Zi Liang is a devout worshiper of Chauntea, the Earth Mother. She has considerably less faith in Goldenfields' defenders, so she patrols the temple-farm during her off-duty hours.
Ideal: "If we faithfully tend to our gardens and our fields, Chauntea will smile upon us."
Bond: "Goldenfields is the breadbasket of the North. People depend on its safety and prosperity, and I'll do what must be done to protect it."
Flaw: "I don't trust authority. I do what my heart says is right."

action.title: Multiattack
value: Zi makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Quarterstaff
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8+1) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.title: Sling
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage. Zi carries twenty sling stones.

zombie.name: Zombie
zombie.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

trait.title: Undead Fortitude
value: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

zuggtmoy.name: Zuggtmoy
zuggtmoy.immune: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Zuggtmoy's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 22). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, locate animals or plants, ray of sickness
3/day each: dispel magic, ensnaring strike, entangle, plant growth
1/day: etherealness, teleport

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapon
value: Zuggtmoy's weapon attacks are magical.

action.title: Multiattack
value: Zuggtmoy makes four pseudopod attacks.

action.title: Pseudopod
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

action.title: Infestation Spores (3/Day)
value: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in cloud fills a 20-foof-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

action.title: Mind Control Spores (Recharge 5—6)
value: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Humanoids and beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected, the creature is charmed by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

Zuggtmoy can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Zuggtmoy regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.title: Attack
value: Zuggtmoy makes one pseudopod attack.

legendary.title: Exert Will
value: One creature charmed by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as she directs or to make a weapon attack against a target that she designates.

zuggtmoy.spells: detect magic, locate animals or plants, ray of sickness, dispel magic, ensnaring strike, entangle, plant growth, etherealness, teleport
